events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it does not fit me at all. I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund case based on the mention of returning the product and wanting money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the jacket return.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I am here to assist you with your return and refund process.
Could you please confirm the order number and whether the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the jacket is brand new, still with tags attached. It just doesnâ€™t fit well.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 30 days for a full refund. I will send you the prepaid shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prepaid label offer to make the return easy.
The return process has been initiated with a prepaid label sent via email. Please ship the jacket and we will process your refund once received.
Just following up to ensure you were able to return the jacket and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday using the prepaid label. Looking forward to receiving the refund soon. Thank you!
Your refund has been processed successfully and should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for contacting us. We are closing this case now, and please feel free to reach out if you have further questions or concerns.
